item.title: tatiana add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "life's not a paragraph And death i think is no parenthesis" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Most men lead lives of quiet desperation and go to the grave with the song still in them." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Is it so bad, then, to be misunderstood? Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "And if my heart be scarred and burned, The safer, I, for all I learned." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "If I didn't care for fun and such, I'd probably amount to much. But I shall stay the way I am, Because I do not give a damn." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: tatiana add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best day and night to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight and never stop fighting." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The only abnormality is the incapacity to love." -- Anais Nin

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "He considers me also a little fragile because artistic. I need to be cared for, like a potted plant." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Mervyn Peake
item.description: "Lingering is so very lonely when one lingers all alone." -- Mervyn Peake

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Resist much, obey little." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: tatiana add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "Unbeing dead isn't being alive." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: tatiana add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Nicholas Tharcher
item.description: "The essence of independence has been to think and act according to standards from <i>within</i>, not <i>without</i>: to follow one's own path, not that of the crowd." -- Nicholas Tharcher

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "The joy of life consists in the exercise of one's energies, continual growth, constant change, the enjoyment of every new experience. To stop means simply to die. The eternal mistake of mankind is to set up an attainable ideal." -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "Every man and every woman is a star." -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "Life is hard. After all, it kills you." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: tatiana add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "It takes courage to love, but pain through love is the purifying fire which those who love generously know. We all know people who are so much afraid of pain that they shut themselves up like clams in a shell and, giving out nothing, receive nothing and therefore shrink until life is a mere living death." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
